name: labxa/rfcaller
title: Random Forest algorithms to detect somatic mutations in tumor-normal samples

normalIndex.title: normalIndex
normalIndex.description: Index of normal BAM. Not required but recommended. It can be generated with samtools index

tumorIndex.title: tumorIndex
tumorIndex.description: Index of tumor BAM. Not required but recommended. It can be generated with samtools index.

genomeFasta.title: genomeFasta
genomeFasta.description: Reference genome in FASTA format (bgzip supported)

genomeIndexFai.title: genomeIndexFai
genomeIndexFai.description: FAI index of FASTA genome. Not required but recommended. It can be generated with samtools faidx

genomeIndexGzi.title: genomeIndexGzi
genomeIndexGzi.description: GZI index of FASTA genome. Only when the FASTA is compressed with BGZIP. Not required but recommended. It can be generated with samtools faidx

dbSNP.title: dbSNP
dbSNP.description: VCF files provided by the image with common SNPs (MAF ≥ 1%) to eliminate these positions from the analysis. In case you want to use your own VCFs use the 'Other' argument and complete the 'dbSNPuser' option

dbSNPuser.title: dbSNPuser
dbSNPuser.description: Same as 'dbSNP', but provided by the user. Only when 'dbSNP' argument is 'Other'

dbSNPfile.title: dbSNPfile
dbSNPfile.description: VCF provided by the user with common SNPs to eliminate these positions from the analysis (bgzip supported)

dbSNPindex.title: dbSNPindex
dbSNPindex.description: In case of upload a VCF.GZ (bgzip) file, provide also the index. Not required but recommended. It can be generated with tabix

PoN.title: PoN
PoN.description: TSV provided by the image with positions that appear recurrently in a Panel of Normals to eliminate them from the analysis. In case you want to use your own PoN use the 'Other' argument and complete the 'PoNuser' option

PoNuser.title: PoNuser
PoNuser.description: Same as 'PoN', but provided by the user. Only when 'PoN' argument is 'Other'

PoNfile.title: PoNfile
PoNfile.description: PoN provided by the user with positions to eliminate from the analysis (bgzip not supported).

regions.title: regions
regions.description: List of regions in which to make the call in VCF, BCF or TSV format

contamination.title: contamination
contamination.description: Percentage of tumor contamination in normal sample

assembly.title: assembly
assembly.description: BCFTOOLS tag for ploidy to use in variant calling

assemblyTag.title: assemblyTag
assemblyTag.description: BCFTOOLS tag for ploidy to use in variant calling

assemblyFile.title: assemblyFile
assemblyFile.description: File with ploidy information. For more information use the command bcftools call --ploidy ?

TD_mut_SNV.title: TD_mut_SNV
TD_mut_SNV.description: Minimum number of mutated reads for a position in tumor sample to not discard it (SNVs).

TD_mut_INDEL.title: TD_mut_INDEL
TD_mut_INDEL.description: Minimum number of mutated reads for a position in tumor sample to not discard it (INDELs).

ND_mut_SNV.title: ND_mut_SNV
ND_mut_SNV.description: Maximum number of mutated reads allowed for a position in normal sample (SNVs).

ND_mut_INDEL.title: ND_mut_INDEL
ND_mut_INDEL.description: Maximum number of mutated reads allowed for a position in normal sample (INDELs).

ND_window.title: ND_window
ND_window.description: Window size around a position to look for mutations in normal sample (INDELs)

SNV_threshold.title: SNV_threshold
SNV_threshold.description: Minimum regression value to consider a SNV as good

INDEL_threshold.title: INDEL_threshold
INDEL_threshold.description: Minimum regression value to consider an INDEL as good

polyINDEL_threshold.title: polyINDEL_threshold
polyINDEL_threshold.description: Minimum regression value to consider an homopolymerINDEL as good

vcf.title: vcf
vcf.description: VCF with the mutations detected by the pipeline

author: Ander Díaz-Navarro & Xose S Puente
